rukus.text: seonjijayeo mid-eum-eulo ssaum-e imhaneun geudeul-ege him-eul bugdod-ula neohuigaunde isibmyeong-i innaehandamyeon ibaeg myeong-eul mullichil geos-imyeo neohuiga baegmyeong ilamyeon bulsinjadeul-ui cheonmyeong-eul mullichi lini geudeul-eun umaehan baegseong-inila

hananim-i neohuiui jim-eul deol-eo jusa neohui gaunde eon-yagham-i iss-eum eul asigo eunhyeleul bepusini neohui gaunde baegmyeong-i innaehaneunja issdamyeon ibaegmyeong-eul mullichil geos-iyo cheonmyeong-ila myeon hananim-ui tteus-e ttala icheonmyeong-eul mullichige hasini hananim-eun innaeha neunjawa hamkke hasim-ila

sasangjaga manh-a hangyeleul neom-eul ttaeneun je-oeina yeeonjaga pololo buteo bosang-eul bad-aseoneun anidoem-ila neohuineun hyeonse-ui yuheug-eul wonhana ha nanim-eun naeseleul wonhasini hananim-eun ganghasigo hyeonmyeonghasinola
hananim-eulobuteo yulbeob-i eobs-eoss damyeon neohuiga chwihan daegalo neohui wi e museoun beol-i iss-eoss-eulila
neohuiga eod-eun heolagdoen jeonlipum eul chwihaljini ineun heolagdoen jong-eun geos-ila hananim-eul dulyeowohala hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasinila
